Package info.oais.infomodel.implementation

Class InformationObjectRefImpl

java.lang.Object
info.oais.infomodel.implementation.InformationObjectRefImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
InformationObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccessRightsInformationRefImpl, ContextInformationRefImpl, FixityInformationRefImpl, PackageDescriptionRefImpl, PreservationDescriptionInformationRefImpl, ProvenanceInformationRefImpl, ReferenceInformationRefImpl, RepresentationInformationRefImpl
public class InformationObjectRefImpl extends Object implements InformationObject
An OAIS Information Object is a Data Object plus its RepresentationInformation Here we use the DigitalObject, which is a subtype of Data Object
Author:
david
